data.feedback: Plan comprehensively covers all 9 required Flutter epics with proper architecture patterns. Backend API integration points are accurately referenced. Only minor issue: ios/Podfile listed as 'modify' but doesn't exist (should be 'create'). All other files verified to exist.
issues: ios/Podfile does NOT exist - move from filesToModify to filesToCreate in epic-platform-config
suggestions: Adjust executionOrder for sequential epics (dashboard:3 → sharing:4 → goals:5)
Remove duplicate dependencies in epic-realtime-client and epic-native-integration
Consider adding backend auth.service.ts to filesToRead for epic-auth-ui
